document.full_text: syrian security forces sealed off the coastal city of banias following pro-democracy protests and killings by irregulars loyal to syrian president bashar al-assad, witnesses said on monday.
document.title: syrian forces seal off banias, tension mounts
lines_and_colors: syrian security forces sealed off the coastal city of banias following pro-democracy protests and killings by irregulars loyal to syrian president bashar al-assad, witnesses said on monday.
